title: gauri girirAja kumAri
sahitya:
gauri girirAja kumAri gAna vana mayUri gambhIra kaumAri


anupallavi

 dUrIkrta duritE ati lalitE durgA lakSmI sarasvatI sahitE 
shaurIsha virincAdi mahitE shAmbhavI namastE paradEvatE


caraNam   nava cakra svarUpAvatArE nAdabrahma vAcakatArE shiva paramAnandAmrtadhArE 
shrngArAdi navarasAdhArE bhava guruguha gaNapati samsArE bhaktiprada vEdAgamasArE 
pavana dhArana yOga vicArE pAlita bhaktajana mandArE tava caraNa pankajOdbhava tatva 
samaStyAgArE suvarNa maNimayAdi pancavimshati prAkArE shudhAsindhumadhyE 
cintAmaNyAgArE shivAkAramancE parashiva paryanka vihArE
